metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5703 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The tcp_v6_syn_recv_sock function in net/ipv6/tcp_ipv6.c in the Linux kernel through 4.14.11 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (slab out-of-bounds write) or possibly have unspecified other impact via vectors involving TLS.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5703` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-13-generic - 4.15.0-13.14
linux-image-4.15.0-13-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-13.14
linux-image-4.15.0-13-lowlatency - 4.15.0-13.14
linux-image-extra-4.15.0-13-generic - 4.15.0-13.14
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1003-aws - 4.15.0-1003.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
